Ace.description: All Aces gain +20% Hit Speed at combat start. Your strongest Ace becomes the Captain instead of the strongest Troops with the highest Merge Level

levels.bonus: Captain gains +40% bonus damage and +40% HP of damage dealt
Captain gains +70% bonus damage and +70% HP of damage dealt

Clan.description: Once per round, Clans heal quickly and gain bonus hit speed when at 50% HP. Clans no longer heal their teammates with 4 active troops

levels.bonus: +70% max HP and hit speed for Clans

Goblin.description: You'll get an extra random Goblin for free next round

levels.bonus: +100% chance of gaining a 3 or 4-Elixir Goblin

Noble.description: Frontline Nobles take less damege, while backline Nobles gain bonus damage

Undead.description: Combat Start: The enemies with the highest HP are cursed, and your Undead gain 30% bonus Damage when cursed enemies are defeated

levels.bonus: Curses 2 enemies, max HP cut by 25%
Curses 3 enemies, max HP cut by 50%
Curses 4 enemies, max HP cut by 75%

Assassin.description: Combat Start: Assassins will leap to the enemy's backline Troops

Avenger.description: Avengers gain bonus Damage, with the last troops standing gaining double Damage

Juggernaut.description: Combat Start: Juggernauts and allies behind them gain a 11s Shield and are immune to control effects while shielded

Ranger.description: Rangers gain Hit Speed per attack, stacking up to 25x

Blaster.description: Blasters gain +1 Range and extra damage based on distance

Electric.description: After 10s, lightning strikes all enemies once and stunned troops 3x

levels.bonus: Each strike deals 20% max HP damage

Fire.description: Fires gain stackable bonus damage upon enemies' defeat

Mage.description: Combat Start: Strongest enemy troop is turned into a harmless rabbit for some time
